text: Snina (; ) is a town in the Prešov Region in Slovakia. About 20,000 people live there. It is at the meeting point of the river Cirocha and the small river Pčolinka in the valley between the Bukovec Mountains foothills and the Vihorlat Mountains. == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Towns in Slovakia Category:Prešov Region
title: Snina
